MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH44 postcode area of Wallasey, affecting properties in Colville Road, Marlowe Road, Monmouth Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:49pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:20pm on 17th February 2021.
